intro: Lophosoria densa, commonly known as the dense lophosoria, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Araceae, which includes many aquatic and semi-aquatic plants. The plant is characterized by its dense, compact growth habit and its striking, showy inflorescence. It features a spadix surrounded by a colorful spathe, typical of the Araceae family. Lophosoria densa is often cultivated as an ornamental plant in water gardens and bog environments.
